mean_cn: v.安慰，慰问；  n.控制台，仪表板
mean_en: a flat surface which contains all the controls and switches for a machine, a piece of electronic equipment, etc.
sentence: My boyfriend always tries his best to console me when I'm upset.
sentence_trans: 我伤心的时候，男朋友总是想尽一切办法安慰我。
word_etyma: con共同 + sole安慰 → 一起安慰 → console安慰
